description: A circle route around Northstar Mountain, in Kimberley offering excellent views of the St. Mary's River Valley and Matthew Creek Watershed.  The trail is excellent for bikers, runners or hikers.  The trail us featured annually at the Round the Mountain Festival, held in June.
directions: Trailhead is located at Kimberley Nordic Centre parking lot when you will find a kiosk and trail map.  Copies of the map can also be picked up at the Kimberley Visitor Centre.
title: Round the Mountain
